title: Error sources - gravimetric determination of Ag

content.question:
The percentage of silver in a solid sample is determined gravimetrically by converting the silver to Ag+(aq) and precipitating it as silver chloride. Failure to do which of the following could cause errors in the analysis?

Account for the mass of the weighing paper when determining the mass of the sample

Measure the temperature during the precipitation reaction

Wash the precipitate

Heat the AgCl precipitate to constant mass

skill.text: 2.E: Identify or describe potential sources of experimental error.
